p.seg: here 's your bill . how did you find the food ?
i 've never tasted anything like this before .
i 'm glad you liked it . we should get tighter again sometime .
i think we shall try the cantonese food . can you recommend some dishes to us ?
we can choose one from veal cutlet , pork chop , chicken noodle soup , or ten-ingredient deluxe fried ice .
but you 're a man . you 're stronger . that 's why you 're better at spiking , and slamming than me . it 's why i kept trying to set you up all the time . but you kept missing them .
